name: 3d-tank-configurator
description: 3D Tank Configurator su Three.js ir Express backend

scripts.dev: npm run setup && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:css"
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build-css && npm run copy-three
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: npm run build-css && npm run copy-three && tsc
scripts.start: npm run build && concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && cd server && npm run clean
